Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.name: isContinuous
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether changes in the slider’s value generate continuous update events.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.name: minimumTrackTintColor
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.abstract: The color used to tint the default minimum track images.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.name: maximumTrackTintColor
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.abstract: The color used to tint the default maximum track images.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.name: thumbTintColor
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.abstract: The color used to tint the default thumb images.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.name: focusScaleFactor
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/c:@M@TvOSSlider.abstract: Scale factor applied to the slider when receiving the focus

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: stepValue
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Value added or subtracted from the current value on steps left or right updates

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: setValue(_:animated:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Sets the slider’s current value, allowing you to animate the change visually.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: setMinimumTrackImage(_:for:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Assigns a minimum track image to the specified control states.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: setMaximumTrackImage(_:for:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Assigns a maximum track image to the specified control states.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: setThumbImage(_:for:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Assigns a thumb image to the specified control states.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: currentMinimumTrackImage
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: The minimum track image currently being used to render the slider.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: currentMaximumTrackImage
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Contains the maximum track image currently being used to render the slider.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: currentThumbImage
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: The thumb image currently being used to render the slider.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: minimumTrackImage(for:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Returns the minimum track image associated with the specified control state.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: maximumTrackImage(for:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Returns the maximum track image associated with the specified control state.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.name: thumbImage(for:)
Classes/TvOSSlider.html#/s:10TvOSSliderA.abstract: Returns the thumb image associated with the specified control state.

Classes/TvOSSlider.html.name: TvOSSlider
Classes/TvOSSlider.html.abstract: A control used to select a single value from a continuous range of values.
